DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material Lot Number Text ISO21090.ST.SIMPLE.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An object intended for use whether alone or in combination for diagnostic, prevention, monitoring, or therapeutic purposes. EXAMPLE(S): tongue depressor, pacemaker An alphanumeric string used to identify a particular batch of the product.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material Lot Number Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A defined quantity of manufactured material or product produced in a single manufacturing process or series of process steps so that it reasonably is expected to be homogeneous.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.:The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: A defined quantity of manufactured material or product produced in a single manufacturing process or series of process steps so that it reasonably is expected to be homogeneous.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.:The words of something written.

A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
